name: Input Fields - Interactive Components Demo (Community)
description:
A detailed video showing how to create an input field or text box using the interactive components feature in Figma which is still in the beta version. Now within a single frame, we can have a real input field experience in Figma. All input interactions happen within a single frame.

#InputField #TextBox #InteractiveComponents


Explanation & Demo: https://youtu.be/CFOIDPKE1bw
